scripts.install: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace helen install"  "yarn workspace paris install"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace helen build"  "yarn workspace paris build"
scripts.lint: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace helen lint"  "yarn workspace paris lint"
scripts.format: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace helen format"  "yarn workspace paris format"
